variable.name: CVDTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND CVDDATE (DATE OF CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE STATUS)

variable.name: DTHTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND DATEDTH (DATE OF DEATH)

variable.name: LATTTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND LASTATT (DATE OF LAST EXAM ATTENDED (THROUGH EXAM 7 OFFSPRING AND EXAM 28 FOR ORIGINAL COHORT)

variable.name: LCONTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND LASTCON (DATE OF LAST CONTACT THROUGH 2006)

variable.name: LSOETIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND LASTSOE (DATE OF THE LATEST RECORD IN THE SOE 2006 FILE)
